    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        Floating action buttons. If View == AddCharacter we configure each characteristic of the player, and check to see the user wont try to create more than five, which is the limit. If View == Next, we check that not the initial tile, nor the final tile are of those terrains through which the character is not able to pass. Finally, we get all the information into the intent for the next activity.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:
        v - View of the button clicked.
